item.description:
On November 28th Blues Cafe will be hosting Lindy Hop and Balboa night. As always, it will take place in the beautiful Springstep building in Medford. DJs will be spinning classic jazz tunes from the Swing Era. Joining us will be DJ Jay Provost, well known from Boston Swing Central! Also, hailing from Connecticut we have Javier Johnson spinning the hot numbers for your dancing pleasure!

Admission: $15/$12 seniors/students
Lesson: 8-9pm Beginner Lindy Hop with Tony & Aurelie Tye from Hop to the Beat
Social dancing: 9-12:30am

We have two dance performances this month: the Boston Balboa Underground and The Downcity Strutters from Providence!

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe
